comments.text:
Set up the Korporus monorepo with pnpm workspaces and the initial directory structure:

```
korporus/
├── apps/
│   ├── shell/              (Epic 2)
│   ├── demo-angular/       (Epic 4)
│   └── demo-react/         (Epic 4)
├── packages/
│   ├── app-hello/          (Epic 3)
│   ├── app-manifest/       (Epic 1)
│   └── web-component-wrapper/  (Epic 1)
├── infra/                  (Epic 5)
├── Dockerfile              (Epic 5)
├── pnpm-workspace.yaml
├── tsconfig.base.json
└── README.md
```

Configure TypeScript with a shared base config. Set up linting (ESLint + Prettier). Add a root README.md explaining the project structure and how to run things locally.

### Acceptance Criteria
- `pnpm install` succeeds from the root.
- Each workspace package can import from sibling packages.
- TypeScript builds pass with strict mode enabled.

### Dependencies
None (first step).

comments.author: ryan.porter
comments.text:
Monorepo scaffolded. Created:
- pnpm-workspace.yaml with apps/* and packages/* globs
- root package.json with workspace scripts (build, dev, lint, typecheck, test, format)
- tsconfig.base.json with strict mode, ES2022 target, bundler module resolution
- eslint.config.js (flat config) with @typescript-eslint + prettier
- .prettierrc.json and .prettierignore
- Stub package.json + tsconfig.json for all 6 workspace packages
- Placeholder src/ dirs with .gitkeep for each package
- infra/ directory
- Updated README.md with architecture, setup, and manifest contract docs
- pnpm install succeeds, TypeScript 5.9.3 resolves correctly

Tasks 1.2 and 1.3 can now begin in parallel.
